From: sender@example.com

Subject: Simple Email Without Attachment

MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hello,

This is a simple email message without any attachments.
It contains only plain text content.

Best regards,
